lead_paragraph: Secretary Ashton B. Carter formally acknowledged that American error resulted in Navy vessels entering Iranian territorial waters.

byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt reported from Tampa, and Helene Cooper from Washington. Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and HELENE COOPER

snippet: Secretary Ashton B. Carter formally acknowledged that American error resulted in Navy vessels entering Iranian territorial waters.

headline.main: Defense Secretary Says U.S. Sailors Made Navigational Error Into Iranian Waters
headline.print_headline: Error Led to Iran Waters, Defense Secretary Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter says two United States Navy vessels captured after entering Iranian waters in Persian Gulf did so accidentally; military officials pledge review of procedures to determine what caused navigational error.
